meta.name: Flight Data Visualization with Chart.js, QuickChart API & Telegram Bot

parameters.text:

parameters.content:
## üì± ENTRY POINT
Listens for Telegram messages & button clicks

‚úÖ Triggers on:
- /start command
- Menu button selections
- Chart type selections

üí° TIP: This is where users first interact with the bot!

## üéØ COMMAND DETECTOR
Smart filter to detect /start command

‚úÖ Purpose:
- Shows welcome menu for new users
- Routes existing interactions to chart generation
- Prevents unnecessary menu displays

‚ö° Simple but essential routing logic!

## üé® USER INTERFACE
Beautiful welcome menu with chart options

üéØ Features:
- Reply keyboard for easy selection
- Emoji-enhanced buttons
- Clear chart type descriptions
- Resize keyboard for mobile UX

üí° First impression matters - make it count!

## üìä DATA SOURCE
Reads flight dataset from local storage

üìç File Location: /data/flights.csv
üîß Encoding: UTF-8
üìà Contains: ~1k (sample) flight records

üìã Expected Columns:
- airline, flight, source_city
- departure_time, arrival_time
- duration, price, class
- destination_city, stops

‚ö†Ô∏è NOTE: Ensure file path exists and is accessible!

## ‚öôÔ∏è DATA PARSER
Converts CSV into structured JSON objects

üîÑ Process:
Raw CSV ‚Üí Parsed JSON objects
Each row ‚Üí Individual flight record
Headers ‚Üí Object properties

‚úÖ Output:
- 1000+ individual items
- Each item = one flight
- Ready for JavaScript processing

üéØ Essential for data manipulation!

## üéõÔ∏è TRAFFIC CONTROLLER
Routes users to correct chart generation


‚úÖ Smart Matching:
- Text-based button detection
- Exact string matching
- Clean output routing

üìä One input ‚Üí Four possible chart outputs!

## üé® CHART GENERATOR (4 Types)

üìà BAR: Top 10 Airlines by flight count
ü•ß PIE: Duration categories (Short/Medium/Long)  
üç© DOUGHNUT: Price ranges (Budget‚ÜíLuxury)
üìä LINE: Price trends by flight duration

üîß Process Flow:
Data ‚Üí Count/Group ‚Üí Chart.js Config ‚Üí QuickChart URL ‚Üí PNG Image

‚ö° Features:
- Professional styling with colors
- Auto-generated insights & percentages
- Mobile-optimized 800x600 images
- Custom captions with key findings

üí° Output: Beautiful charts + smart insights in ~3 seconds!
